Reviews.Title: As Advertised, Good Value
Reviews.Author: Motorhead
Reviews.Content: Used as a second computer, no issues, works well, large screen, a bit heavy, but serves me well.  Cost, quality, is a good value.

Reviews.Title: Great value for the money
Reviews.Author: JS
Reviews.Content: I bought this for a friend who needed a computer to do everything but had a small budget. This laptop is really a hell of a value for the price. Screen looks great, build is sturdy. It has everything you need, except maybe blu-ray. Yes, it's not the absolute fastest, but it's still pretty fast. And guess what - just a few years ago, top of the line computers weren't even as fast as this one, and we did just fine. For the price of a top of the line computer, you can buy like 4 of these. You really can't beat that deal! I just feel bad wondering what slave labor must have been involved to keep the price so low.

Reviews.Title: product performance and prior consumer of a compaq desktop
Reviews.Author: peter
Reviews.Content: I chose this rating because the product met my expectations, I like that it has a 1yr  warranty which gav

Reviews.Title: price
Reviews.Author: Frank
Reviews.Content: I found this laptop at Walmart last week $228I know, it's a special price butyou can save money...

Reviews.Title: garbage
Reviews.Author: John J. Cusimano "JR"
Reviews.Content: I thought I dont need much. Stream a few movies check a few emails. Wow..No idea it was possible for anything to be this cheap. Speakers are no where near loud enough so I have to plug in powered speakers or head phones. No big deal in itself but the jack or plug doesn't get a good connection. Jiggle jiggle jiggle then stabilize the wire so it doesnt hang and cant move....I wont continue with everything I have done trying to keep the sound but it is the cheap computer. I know this because I have tried 2 sets of head phones and 2 pair of speakers and none of them work properly.  Watching hulu or netflix it pauses 4 to 30 times an hour. It has froze up several times in the first 3 months of having it...OH  2 days here and a button or key just fell off it.  I have no idea what it was ...3rd on left from the space bar.  Sometimes its dial up slow and I have high speed-comcast. Yuppers, ya get what ya pay for. However this has been crap since day one so if they dont even make an effort to put out a quality product on their cheaper stuff there is no way compaq will ever get any more of my money in the future.

Reviews.Title: Works
Reviews.Author: Brandon N
Reviews.Content: I picked mine up at a pawn shop for about $190 and it was the cheapest they had.I haven't had a computer better than this, but know how they are. This computer doesn't exactly handle multitasking well, and it can have some issues with lagging behind after a few hours of intense use. The processor is absolute garbage, it's about as slow as it could be, and the RAM amount isn't much better. It is however USEABLE for gaming. I am a PC Gamer and haven't had any problems with most games I play. Most things I do run fine, with a little lagg on response time here and there. Overall, if you don't need the rig of the century, and don't have $500 sitting around, this should work fine.

Reviews.Title: Like new
Reviews.Author: Karen Smith
Reviews.Content: This reconditioned laptop is performing well. The only thing is I wish it came with an operating manual. It has a webcam that I can't figure out how to use.

Reviews.Title: Excellent deal!
Reviews.Author: elick
Reviews.Content: Excellent laptop with very high performance. It's very fast and cute. The price was also excellent compared with similar products.

Reviews.Title: Was not an AMD laptop, but an Intel one. :/
Reviews.Author: KeiroD
Reviews.Content: Laptop showed up fine. However, I did not expect to receive an Intel-based laptop... as what I was purchasing was an AMD laptop.Eh. I'll use it anyway because there's not much of an option I've got when it comes to laptops. In any case, at least the laptop has a very easy to use service guide that'll allow me to upgrade the damn processor in it to an i5 or something like that. Maxed the RAM in it already, so... I guess this isn't too bad of a purchase.

Reviews.Title: Eh...
Reviews.Author: gmears127
Reviews.Content: Slow! Even after taking off all of the included software its still sllllooowwwwww[...]  It serves its purpose which is why it was rated with a 3.
